C

Card - Class in UNO.Model
Class to represent a card with a color and number
Card() - Constructor for class UNO.Model.Card
Constructor for default
Card(int, int) - Constructor for class UNO.Model.Card
Constructor for a card with a color and number
CardView - Class in UNO.View
Class for visual aspects of the cards itself along with methods to make these aspects
CardView(Card, View) - Constructor for class UNO.View.CardView
Constructor for a cardview which is for a visual representation of a card
ClickMessage - Class in UNO
Class for Clickmessage

color - Variable in class UNO.Model.Card
The color of card
Controller - Class in UNO.Controller
Class for implementing the game using a queue and valves to take messages from CardView and execute using the model
Controller(View, Model, BlockingQueue<Message>) - Constructor for class UNO.Controller.Controller
